MS MCQs

    Microsoft data estate migration and modernization

    »

    1. Which of the following statements best articulates the importance for organizations to modernize their data estate?

      Organizations in industries that are subject to data restrictions need an on-premises solution to remain compliant.

      Organizations that do not modernize their data estates will no longer be able to run legacy applications.

      Changes in the regulatory environment require organizations to modernize their data estates.

      The scale and economics of cloud make it possible to capture and harness data, and organizations with data estates can unlock transformative insights with advances in AI.


    2. Azure provides organizations with many options for modernizing data. Which approach offers easy migration with no code changes and near zero downtime?

      Azure SQL Database Managed Instance.

      SQL Server on Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS).

      Open Source Software (OSS).

      Hybrid.


    3. Which Microsoft solution helps customers develop cloud-native, multi-model apps with turnkey global distribution and elastic scale-out?

      Power BI

      SQL Server 2017

      Azure Database Migration Service

      Azure Cosmos DB


    4. Cloud scale analytics is a comprehensive set of big-data solutions that help organizations gather, store, process, analyze, and visualize data. Which of the following represents an offering of cloud scale analytics that maps to a common business need?

      Ingest data whether it is structured or unstructured

      High availability enabled by applications that can replicate data anywhere in the world

      Advanced analytics that can help companies predict when customers churn

      Well-defined consistency models that help build scalable applications


    5. Organizations have enormous amounts of data, and the ultimate goal is getting important insights that can help you drive business forward. Which Microsoft solution can deliver business insights with data connections to many cloud data sources and SaaS apps?

      Azure Cosmos DB

      Power BI

      Azure Data Factory

      Azure SQL Database Managed Instance
